title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.27 - Removal from lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.27 - Removal from lists

State Regulations

Any person may be removed from a list: (a) at their own request; (b) at the request of the employer who
applied for his listing; (c) upon
the suspension or revocation of his license; or
(d) where the commission determines that he
was not listed in conformance with this Part, or that such removal will further
the purposes of the act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
